name: Time to Dodge
description:
Time to Dodge is a retro-inspired arcade video game, that has elements of action, minimalist graphics and electro-pop music with infinite and replayable gameplay. In the game the player must dodge different blocks using their reflections, using the intelligence and wisdom to choose well his own way, getting as many coins and score to unlock new characters and game modes.

Features

  • Challenging, addictive, infinite and entertaining gameplay.
  • Minimalist graphics.
  • Simple controls. Play with your thumb.
  • Dozens of unlockable appearances.
  • Unlockable game modes.
